metadata.title: CVE-2015-0847 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
nbd-server.c in Network Block Device (nbd-server) before 3.11 does notproperly handle signals, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (deadlock) via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0847` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nbd-client - 1:3.7-1ubuntu0.1
nbd-server - 1:3.7-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nbd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.7-1ubuntu0.1').
